body.p: A special thanks to the many helpful reviewers listed below for the very important work you have done for ST&HV in 2012. You are often called upon to contribute to the review process, both because your expertise is so central to the field and because you yourself are such a competent and fair scholar. The work that you do, which occurs without much fanfare or recognition, is crucial to the success of ST&HV. On behalf of all the scholars whose work you shape and enhance, THANK YOU!
